feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: A software engineer and AI researcher focusing on natural language processing and machine learning. Created custom NLP solutions, such as an Afaan Oromo News Classification System and an Amharic Context-Aware Spell Checker

entry.title: Changing the conversation in health care

link.title: Changing the conversation in health care

entry.summary: The Language/AI Incubator, an MIT Human Insight Collaborative project, is investigating how AI can improve communications among patients and practitioners.

entry.title: AI shapes autonomous underwater “gliders”
entry.summary: An AI pipeline developed by CSAIL researchers enables unique hydrodynamic designs for bodyboard-sized vehicles that glide underwater and could help scientists gather marine data.

entry.title: Study could lead to LLMs that are better at complex reasoning

link.title: Study could lead to LLMs that are better at complex reasoning

entry.summary: Researchers developed a way to make large language models more adaptable to challenging tasks like strategic planning or process optimization.

entry.title: Exploring data and its influence on political behavior

link.title: Exploring data and its influence on political behavior

entry.summary: In MIT's course 17.831 (Data and Politics), students are introduced to the power of analysis, visualization, and research-supported insight into political outcomes.

entry.title: New postdoctoral fellowship program to accelerate innovation in health care

link.title: New postdoctoral fellowship program to accelerate innovation in health care

entry.summary: Launched with a gift from the Biswas Family Foundation, the Biswas Postdoctoral Fellowship Program will support postdocs in health and life sciences.

entry.title: Robotic probe quickly measures key properties of new materials

link.title: Robotic probe quickly measures key properties of new materials

entry.summary: Developed to analyze new semiconductors, the system could streamline the development of more powerful solar panels.

entry.title: Confronting the AI/energy conundrum
entry.summary: The MIT Energy Initiative’s annual research symposium explores artificial intelligence as both a problem and a solution for the clean energy transition.

entry.title: Accelerating scientific discovery with AI
entry.summary: FutureHouse, co-founded by Sam Rodriques PhD ’19, has developed AI agents to automate key steps on the path toward scientific progress.

entry.title: MIT and Mass General Brigham launch joint seed program to accelerate innovations in health

link.title: MIT and Mass General Brigham launch joint seed program to accelerate innovations in health

entry.summary: The MIT-MGB Seed Program, launched with support from Analog Devices Inc., will fund joint research projects that advance technology and clinical research.

entry.title: Using generative AI to help robots jump higher and land safely

link.title: Using generative AI to help robots jump higher and land safely

entry.summary: MIT CSAIL researchers combined GenAI and a physics simulation engine to refine robot designs. The result: a machine that out-jumped a robot designed by humans.
